name: onepipe-template
description: Template for deploying OnePipe analytics infrastructure

scripts.postinstall:
node -e "const crypto = require('crypto'); const fs = require('fs'); const token = crypto.randomUUID(); const toml = fs.readFileSync('wrangler.toml', 'utf8'); const updated = toml.replace('SETUP_MODE = "true"', 'SETUP_MODE = "true"
SETUP_TOKEN = "' + token + '"'); fs.writeFileSync('wrangler.toml', updated); fs.writeFileSync('.setup-token', token); console.log('
ðŸ”‘ OnePipe Setup Token Generated!
Token:', token, '

After deployment, visit: https://your-worker.your-subdomain.workers.dev/setup?token=' + token);"

author: OnePipe
